subject: Would li.ke to c.hat with you
body:
Dear friend,
I found your piacture on one of the websites, can we talk to 
each other? I might be coming to your place in few weeks.
This would be a great opportunaity to meet each other.
Btw, I ama a woman. I am 2a5. Drop me a line at oego@BounceEmail.info
